title: IPH 348 - Jesus, good above all

lines: in a stable born our brother,
You we make our King most dear.
Lord in heaven, Your grace supplying,
keep us to Your presence near.
all our thoughts and hopes still sharing,
help us all Your truth to hear.
Lord, in all our doings guide us;
pride and hate shall ne’er divide us;
we’ll go on with You beside us,

CCLI: John Mason Neale, 1818 – 1866 and Percy Dearmer, 1867 – 1936 altered compilers  CCLI 128675
